summary: A unitâ€‘test suite that verifies the behavior of the quantum measurement aggregation utilities, ensuring that various outcome encodings (bitstrings, integers, hexadecimal strings, and qudit labels) are correctly interpreted, combined, and that derived statistics such as marginal distributions and the most frequent outcome are accurately computed.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability of quantum result processing in the Qiskit framework so that downstream quantum algorithms and analyses can depend on correct measurement aggregation and statistical extraction.
